# List of presidents of Madagascar__disambig_1

| insignia                = Presidential Standard of Madagascar.svgborder

| seat                    = Antananarivo

This is a list of presidents of Madagascar, since the establishment of the office of President in 1959, during the Malagasy Republic.
Term limits
As of 2025, there is a two-term limit for the president in the Constitution of Madagascar. The term limit has not been met by any president yet.
Succession
In case of a vacancy, the president of the Senate will act as a temporary successor of the president. After the 2025 military coup, Colonel Michael Randrianirina was appointed as interim president.

Term of office in years
This is a list of each president (excluding acting presidents) in order of term length.
Of the 7 people that has served as president, only two, Didier Ratsiraka and Andry Rajoelina, served in non consecutive periods.
